titleStmt.title: An Encoded Transcription of Material from the Sylvia Beach Papers

msIdentifier.repository: Princeton University. Library. Dept. of Rare Books and Special Collections

body.ab:
1928 SEAGER Miss Katherine Seager Oct 30 12 rue de Tournon
1 m 1 vol 25 Deposit 50
October 30th. The Conoisseur Nov 2. Nov 2 Bohemian Life in Paris 0.50 " 7 " 7 Witch " 13 " 13 Garden Party. " 15 15 Outspoken Essays " 19 " 19 Convention & Revolt in Poetry " 22 22 Dove's Nest " 30 " 30 Red Sky at Morning Dec 8 Dec 8 S.R. 1 m 1 vol = 25f. to Dec 30th 1928
Dec 8 Mrs Dalloway Dec 24 " 14 Magic Mountain in 2 vols " 17. " 18 Glory of the Conqueror " 20
Renewed Jan 11 - February 11 1929 25f Jan 11 Renaissance " 21 " 21 Alice in Wonderland Jan 23 " 23 Backwater " 27 " 29 John Keats Forsyte Saga Feb 11 Feb. 11 White Monkey. " 25 25 Rough Justice Mars. 12 Mars 12. Zuleika Dobson - 20

Mch 20 Shropshire Lad Mch. 20. " 22 Broomsticks " 26 " 26 Georgian Stories 1927 Ap 8 Ap 8 Costumes by Eros. Ap 12 " 12 Antic Hay " 15 " 15 Those Barren Leaves not B.B. " 22 " 18 Swan Song = 1f " 22 " 23 - True Heart " 25 " 25 Vestal Fire Mai 1er: " 29 My brother Jonathan Mai 1er: " 29 S.R. to May 11th 1929 = 25.
June 6th. S.R. to July 6th 1929 = 25
